backend/main.mo: Defines core domain types for routines, scoring, user profiles, utilities, and body composition used across the backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports linking feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app logic handling authentication flow, routing, error fallback, legal disclaimer checks, and dashboard redirects.
frontend/src/components/AutophagyScoreIn: Modal dialog explaining Autophagy Score components with bilingual labels, icons, ranges, and progress details.
frontend/src/components/BodyCompositionC: Body composition input card showing weight, body fat, muscle mass, BMI display, and presets with German/English labels.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistCard.ts: Renders a card with a list of checklist items, each having a checkbox, label, and optional description, and handles toggle events.
frontend/src/components/ChipsInput.tsx: Displays a row of preset buttons that trigger a selection callback when clicked, with optional disabled and styling props.
Implements an interactive circular dial using canvas to adjust a numeric value via angle-based dragging with gradients and tick marks.
frontend/src/components/DailyCoachingCar: Shows daily coaching steps and insights with category styling, icons, and multilingual support in a decorative card layout.
frontend/src/components/EnergyCapsule.ts: Visual capsule wrapper that displays content with a fill level based on completion percentage and optional accent modes.
frontend/src/components/FastingTimer.tsx: Provides a fasting-duration selector using a ChronographDial and displays guidance text based on selected hours.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying a copyright notice and link with decorative styling.
frontend/src/components/FutureProjection: Displays future health projections with trend icons and values across biological age, body form, and energy/focus.
frontend/src/components/GradientSlider.t: A customizable slider with gradient track, optional scale labels, and dynamic gradient generation from color stops.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation menu, token balance display, settings dialog, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/JournalCard.tsx: Journal UI allowing creation, editing, deletion, and viewing of timestamped entries with bilingual messages.
frontend/src/components/LegalDisclaimerM: Modal presenting bilingual legal disclaimers with acknowledgment tracking and first‑launch enforcement.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, loading state, and feature icons.
frontend/src/components/NutritionCard.ts: Card to track protein, vegetable, and water intake with stepper controls and preset chips in two languages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form collecting user details and saving them via backend mutation with basic validation.
frontend/src/components/RouterErrorFallb: Displays an error fallback screen, logs router errors, and provides a reload button.
frontend/src/components/ScoreRing.tsx: Renders a canvas-based circular score indicator with gradient arc and optional label/value.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides a profile settings dialog that loads user data, allows edits, validates fields, and saves updates.
frontend/src/components/SleepCard.tsx: Shows sleep duration and quality controls using a stepper and dial with dynamic quality labels.
frontend/src/components/SmartInsight.tsx: Displays a small insight card with an icon based on type and a message.
frontend/src/components/SmartInsightsOve: Shows temporary insight overlays for high or low scores with themed icons and messages.
frontend/src/components/StepperInput.tsx: Numeric stepper with hold-to-accelerate functionality for incrementing or decrementing values.
frontend/src/components/StressCard.tsx: Tracks blood pressure and pulse values with steppers and computes a color‑coded stress indicator.
frontend/src/components/SupplementCard.t: Component for listing, adding, editing, deleting, and toggling supplements with form state and time‑based sorting.
frontend/src/components/TokenWallet.tsx: Displays token balance, transactions, supply info, admin tools, and supports on‑chain transfers with identity integration.
frontend/src/components/TrainingCard.tsx: Manages training sessions including adding, removing, and saving workouts with type, duration, and intensity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, state handling, and restores identities via an authentication context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, routines, supplements, token data, and scores via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive custom theme variables plus utility classes for a luxury gold/dark UI aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Fetches routines and body data, computes statistics, renders charts, and provides analysis reset functionality with localization.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard managing user routines, body metrics, supplements, coaching, and UI cards with multiple backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Implements a journal with creation, editing, deletion, and localization, managing entry state and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays the LIV token wallet with language-specific text and ecosystem features plus the TokenWallet component.
frontend/src/utils/backendVariants.ts: Provides runtime-safe helpers for interpreting backend variant enums and computing intensity and body fat defaults.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCoaching.ts: Generates prioritized daily coaching steps based on user routines and health scores. Includes logic for sleep, hydration, fasting, training, nutrition, and stress.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCoachingInsights: Creates up to three coaching insights using current metrics and optional health trends. Provides warnings, tips, praise, and trend-based messages.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Defines gold/jade gradient theme utilities and helper functions for score-based colors and gradients. Includes tools for creating CSS gradient strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback. Supports both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended color palette, gradients, shadows, and layout utilities using OKLCH variables. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requests related to app load errors, logo removal, and post-login routing changes.
